snippet: Dr. Rosen went on to persuade New York City to adopt stricter standards for removing lead paint from tens of thousands of old buildings.
abstract: Dr John F Rosen, pediatrician whose discovery of high levels of lead poisoning among New York City children propelled him to campaign for national effort to prevent condition, dies at age 77.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Rosen went on to persuade New York City to adopt stricter standards for removing lead paint from tens of thousands of old buildings.

headline.seo: John Rosen, Doctor Who Pushed to Prevent Lead Poisoning, Dies at 77
headline.main: Dr. John Rosen, Who Pushed to Prevent Lead Poisoning, Dies at 77
headline.print_headline: Dr. John Rosen, 77; Pushed to Prevent Lead Poisoning
